House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00065
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE DEPARTMENT OF SPORTS, DEFINING ITS POWERS AND FUNCTIONS AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
SHORT TITLE : Department Of Sports Act
ABSTRACT : Creates the Department of Sports, a government entity primarily responsible for implementing policies on the promotion and development of sports and health fitness programs in the country.
